languages.text: "В таком случае стоит ли тратить время на прелюдии или ссоры? Давайте просто будем счастливы — здесь и сейчас. Столько, сколько позволят нам звезды".

traits.locale_text: "В таком случае стоит ли тратить время на прилюдии или ссоры? Давайте просто будем счастливы — здесь и сейчас. Столько, сколько позволят нам звезды".

languages.text: "In that case, is it really wise to waste time on preludes and quarrels? Let us instead cherish the here and now. For as long as the stars allow us."
languages.original_text: "В таком случае стоит ли тратить время на прелюдии или ссоры? Давайте просто будем счастливы — здесь и сейчас. Столько, сколько позволят нам звезды".

traits.locale_text: "In that case, is it really wise to waste time on preludes and quarrels? Let us instead cherish the here and now. For as long as the stars allow us to."
"In that case, is it really wise to waste time on preludes and quarrels? Let us instead cherish the here and now. For as long as the stars allow us to."
"In that case, is it really wise to waste time on preludes and quarrels? Let us instead cherish the here and now. For as long as the stars allow us."
"In that case, is it really wise to waste time on preludes and quarrels? Let us instead cherish the here and now. For as long as the stars allow us."
"In that case, is it really wise to waste time on preludes and quarrels? Let us instead cherish the here and now. For as long as the stars allow us."

languages.text: “既然如此，我们何必还要浪费时间，进行无益的试探与争吵？群星在上，不如享受当下的时光。”
languages.original_text: "In that case, is it really wise to waste time on preludes and quarrels? Let us instead cherish the here and now. For as long as the stars allow us."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，我们何必还要浪费时间，进行无益的试探与争吵？群星在上，不如享受当下的时光。”

languages.text: "Ist es dann wirklich ratsam, Zeit auf Präludien und Streit zu vergeuden? Genießen wir stattdessen das Hier und Jetzt. So lange die Sterne es uns gestatten."
languages.original_text: "In that case, is it really wise to waste time on preludes and quarrels? Let us instead cherish the here and now. For as long as the stars allow us."

traits.locale_text: "Ist es dann wirklich ratsam, Zeit auf Präludien und Streit zu vergeuden? Genießen wir stattdessen das Hier und Jetzt. So lange die Sterne es uns gestatten."

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, n'est-ce pas idiot de perdre du temps en préludes et en querelles ? Chérissons plutôt l'instant présent. Aussi longtemps que les étoiles nous le permettront. »
languages.original_text: "In that case, is it really wise to waste time on preludes and quarrels? Let us instead cherish the here and now. For as long as the stars allow us."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, n'est-ce pas idiot de perdre du temps en préludes et en querelles ? Chérissons plutôt l'instant présent. Aussi longtemps que les étoiles nous le permettront. »

languages.text: «En ese caso no deberíamos perder el tiempo con disputas. En su lugar, valoremos el aquí y ahora. Mientras las estrellas nos lo permitan».
languages.original_text: "In that case, is it really wise to waste time on preludes and quarrels? Let us instead cherish the here and now. For as long as the stars allow us."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso no deberíamos perder el tiempo con disputas. En su lugar, valoremos el aquí y ahora. Mientras las estrellas nos lo permitan».

languages.text: 「それなら、前置きや口論で時間を消費するのは、本当に正しいことでしょうか？そうではなく、今この時を大切にしましょう。星が私たちを認める限り」
languages.original_text: "In that case, is it really wise to waste time on preludes and quarrels? Let us instead cherish the here and now. For as long as the stars allow us."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、前置きや口論で時間を消費するのは、本当に正しいことでしょうか？そうではなく、今この時を大切にしましょう。星が私たちを認める限り」

languages.text: "O hâlde ön yargılarla, tartışmalarla vakit kaybetmenin ne manası var? Şimdinin, şu anların... Yıldızlar bize müsaade ettiği sürece tadını çıkaralım."
languages.original_text: "In that case, is it really wise to waste time on preludes and quarrels? Let us instead cherish the here and now. For as long as the stars allow us."
